li.a: Michelle Obama Early Childhood Academic Center

span.strong: Riverview Gardens School District Recommended School-At-Home Schedule

p.span: Practice Handwriting; Reflect in Journal: using: Article, Newspaper, or writing prompt, sight words, essay, Book Report
Complete ELA assignment(s), or practice skills using online resources, vocabulary
snack, game on computer, stretch, yoga,jog in place, stretch etc.
During this time teachers are being allotted time to plan. Therefore, they will be offline and unable to answer questions during this time.
Journal: Sum-up learning for the morning.
During this time teachers are being allotted time for lunch. Therefore, they will be offline and unable to answer questions during this time.
During this time scholars may engage in art, music, or physical activity
Complete Math Assignment or access Math online activities
Complete Assignments, Utilize Online Instructional Resources, Research: influential person, current events, take a virtual field trip.

div.div: 1370 Northumberland Drive | St Louis, MO 63137 | PH: 314.869.2505
